responses: Good to see you, how can I help you?
Hi there, how can I help?

patterns: Hello, hope you are doing well?
responses: Hello, I am great
Hello, I am good thank you
Hi, good thank you

patterns: Thank you, you were very helpful
responses: Happy to help!
Any time!
My pleasure

Have a nice day
Bye! Come back again soon.
Sorry, can't understand you

Not sure I understand

patterns: What information can you give me?
About what can you inform me?
responses:
I can tell you some information about:
Student service and university
Different programs on university and what is required to get into them
Where are classrooms
University doctor
Info about sports and recreation within college and how to join them
Canteens of university
Different student associations
Where you can get your notes for study and spend time between lectures 

Also, i can open different services for you that are available on FESB site, like Elearning, Mail, Schedule etc.

patterns: Tell me something about student service
Where can i find student service?
What is phone number of student service?
What can i get from student service?
Give me contact of student service
responses: At Student service, you can get information about your studies and program, the necessary documents for, like, a student bus card or you can report the disappearance of an X- card or if it is invalid. It works from 10AM to 2PM on working days, and it is on the right side of the main entrance of college, straight down the hall. All contacts you need you can find on webpage: https://www.fesb.unist.hr/studenti/studiranje-na-fesb-u/

patterns: Which web services I can use?
I want to see my schedule
Need to find some information about professors
Where can i find my grades?
I want to see my grades
Where can I find my index?
I want to see my index
I want to sign for email
I want to see my materials for study
Where can i find my classes?
I need to get information about subjects
responses: Web Services that FESB provides are ELearning, Mail, Raspored, Nastava, eUpisi, eIndeks. You can find them on the page: https://www.fesb.unist.hr/studenti/

patterns: Who is doctor of the college?
Where can I go on health check?
What is address of my doctor
Give me some information about doctor
responses: The competent doctor of college is Hajdi KrstuloviÄ‡ and her address is Bijankinijeva ulica 13 in Split.For more info, find on webpage: https://www.fesb.unist.hr/studenti/zdravlje-studenata/

patterns: What sport can I play on college?
I want to join some sport
I want to join a gym!
Tell me some information about sports
responses:
FESB offers a variety of activities that you can engage in. Team sports that are offered are soccer, handball, volleyball and also picigin.
There are "Water" sports, like water polo, swimming, rowing and sailing.
You can also sign up for skiing, tennis, chess and even the Bridge card game, which is an elective subject of FER!
If you like to workout in gym or fitness centres, you can get a discount at certain gyms, just fill the form on the page: https://elearning.fesb.unist.hr/course/view.php?id=232

patterns: I have extra time, where can I go?
I have free time, where should I go?
Where can I go to study?
How to spend my free time?
responses:
On the ground floor of the college is the Aquarium, an amphitheater with desks and Internet access, which is available to students until the closing times of college. The student library is located on the second floor and you can use your time to study. If you just want to relax, there is a FESB caffe bar at the entrance from the college.
The University Library is also close and it is available until late hours. For students is available a large reading room on several floors, access to a computer for 3 hours a day and a large number of books.

patterns: Tell me some information about canteens
responses: FESB offers two canteens, a snack bar ("Stop") on the ground floor and the FESB restaurant on top of the building with a rich selection of dishes (students with an X are subsidized the price of food).

patterns: Can you show me what is on menu
I need to find copy shop
Where can i buy study materials?
Can you tell me where is copy shop?
responses: There are two copy shops, one on the ground floor, left from the entrance and another one on second floor, after stairs from the entrance.

patterns: I want to see webpage of college
I need to find my class
Can you show me where are computer labs
I am lost, help me find my classroom
I need to find my classroom
I need to find my computer lab
responses: On FESB, there are 4 sections: A,B,C and D. First number signs on which floor is classroom and other two are for indexing. So, if you are looking for room C301, you will go on section C and floor 3. https://www.fesb.unist.hr/fakultet-opcenito/prostori/

In library you can go study and use some books to learn. Books are mostly on english and they include professional and scientific literature on the field of electrical engineering, informatics, mechanical engineering and shipbuilding.
You can find it on second floor, right next to the copy shop.Library works from 8AM to 4PM. For more information, you can go on page: https://www.fesb.unist.hr/studenti/knjiznica/
